item.title: Laurae1212 add a quote by Fyodor Dostoevsky
item.description: "To go wrong in one's own way is better then to go right in someone else's." -- Fyodor Dostoevsky

item.title: Laurae1212 add a quote by Fyodor Dostoevsky
item.description: "Man is sometimes extraordinarily, passionately, in love with suffering..." -- Fyodor Dostoevsky

item.title: Laurae1212 add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "The person, be it gentleman or lady, who has not pleasure in a good novel, must be intolerably stupid." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Laurae1212 add a quote by Leo Tolstoy
item.description: "Pierre was right when he said that one must believe in the possibility of happiness in order to be happy, and I now believe in it. Let the dead bury the dead, but while I'm alive, I must live and be happy." -- Leo Tolstoy

item.title: Laurae1212 add a quote by Leo Tolstoy
item.description: "Everyone thinks of changing the world, but no one thinks of changing himself." -- Leo Tolstoy

item.title: Laurae1212 add a quote by F. Scott Fitzgerald
item.description: "So we beat on, boats against the current, borne back ceaselessly into the past." -- F. Scott Fitzgerald

item.title: Laurae1212 add a quote by Voltaire
item.description: "Judge a man by his questions rather than by his answers." -- Voltaire

item.title: Laurae1212 add a quote by Voltaire
item.description:
"I have never made but one prayer to God, a very short one: Oh Lord, make my enemies ridiculous. And God granted it."
(<i>Letter to Étienne Noël Damilaville</i>, May 16, 1767)" -- Voltaire

item.title: Laurae1212 add a quote by Catullus
item.description: "soles occidere et redire possunt: nobis cum semel occidit breuis lux, nox est perpetua una dormienda. " -- Catullus

item.title: Laurae1212 add a quote by Donna Tartt
item.description: "Does such a thing as "the fatal flaw," that showy dark crack running down the middle of a life, exist outside literature?" -- Donna Tartt

item.title: Laurae1212 add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "The story so far: In the beginning the Universe was created. This has made a lot of people very angry and been widely regarded as a bad move." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Laurae1212 add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein
